name: YouTube - Project 2012 (Legacy)
description:
NOTICE!!!: This greasemonkey extension works sort of (if you refresh the page) but since it's so inconsistent i won't be using this. RIP- https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/39405-youtube-classic-for-2018-polymer-disable
This is a project just for fun :) solo because i'm using this to learn code

Tries to imitate YouTube in 2012. ***credits to naadir500 for inspiration, and their licensing to use their code***

This is best to be used with:
https://userstyles.org/styles/147374/youtube-old-colors
https://userstyles.org/styles/162809/youtube-s-2011-2012-html-5-player
additional_info:
Version 1.21 (Final) Changelog:
- removed "Mix" playlists
Version 1.2 (Legacy) Changelog:
nothing
Version 1.1 (Unstable) Changelog:
Hopefully i'll learn how to edit in javascript and to edit code better in css so that I can fix some of the issues in new YouTube.
- added and modified all code from http://userstyles.org/styles/177100
- added "by [creator name]" next to publish date, however doesn't have proper kerning based on the length of the former text
- fixed height of the main white box thingy and the guide
- added my name (unstable)
- made title to be proportionate with the 2012 layout
- added style to Add To, Share, More buttons
- had to modify YouTube Old Colors, so I might have to integrate that into the css.

Known Bugs:
When the description is blank, the gradient will collide with the Share buttons.
"by [creator name]" doesn't move based on the length of the publish date
"by" is underlined along with the creator name
trying to change the name in the top right corner results in the position of the upload text changing

discussions.name: Good job on the theme! Can't wait to see it finished.
Please do not abandon the project :(
A little buggy but great. Don't discontinue.
